name: Q [Demo]
description:
Jump into a neon-filled platformer world as Q and overcome a gauntlet of tricky platform challenges.

Game features:

  • First demo of our upcoming game
  • Neon-filled retro-inspired artstyle
  • Over 60 levels filled with dangers and obstacles
  • Explore different chapters as you meet dangerous challenges along the way
  • Learn additional movement techniques to reach new platforming heights
  • Race against the Clock to become the fastest Q
  • Enjoy a retro-synthwave inspired soundtrack

Follow us on Twitter, Facebook and Discord to get the latest news on the development of Q!

Recommendation: "Q" is best played with a controller.
